scripts.ohana-nix: curl https://baltocdn.com/helm/signing.asc | sudo apt-key add - && sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https --yes echo "deb https://baltocdn.com/helm/stable/debian/ all main" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/helm-stable-debian.list && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install helm && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install google-cloud-sdk && curl -s -L "https://github.com/loft-sh/vcluster/releases/latest" | sed -nE 's!.*"([^"]*vcluster-linux-amd64)".*!https://github.com\1!p' | xargs -n 1 curl -L -o vcluster && chmod +x vcluster; sudo mv vcluster /usr/local/bin;
